title: Shadow People - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/7/19
itunes:title: Shadow People - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/7/19
description:
George Noory and author Heidi Hollis explore her research into shadow people and the Hatman, demonic entities that people are seeing in the middle of the night, whether they are coming from another dimension and if they are trying to steal people's souls.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
George Noory and author Heidi Hollis explore her research into shadow people and the Hatman, demonic entities that people are seeing in the middle of the night, whether they are coming from another dimension and if they are trying to steal people's souls.

itunes:summary: An examination of demonic spirits that attack and haunt people at night.
